page.title: 12HOUSING: WARLEY, ESSEX
page.content: There is a{wide range}of housing types within the area, although house prices are extremely high by national standards and are also rising faster than the national average (at about 11-15% p.a.). Great Warley 583907 is a village containing{cottage style properties, complete with weather boarding. These also occur at 594896. There are some large{farm houses}such as Boyle's Court 578915 and Codham Hall 587890. The Green Belt also contains{large detached houses}e.g. at 577900, whose value would be even higher were it not for the noise from the M25. In contrast the area around the Ford Offices at Warley 594915 is mostly{housing estate -}some of it {council}owned, some of it blocks of flats - although there is some older cottage style and{terraced}property along the B186 in Warley.
